eu.amidst.core.inference

Interface PointEstimator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MAPInference, MPEInference

    public interface PointEstimator
    This interface handles a Bayesian posterior point-estimator in a BayesianNetwork.
    See Also:
    "eu.amidst.core.examples.inference"

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Assignment getEstimate()
      Returns the log probability of the computed estimate.
      double getLogProbabilityOfEstimate()
      Returns the log probability of the computed estimate.
      BayesianNetwork getOriginalModel()
      Returns the original model of this PointEstimator.
      void runInference()
      Runs inference.
      void setEvidence(Assignment assignment)
      Sets the evidence for this PointEstimator.
      void setModel(BayesianNetwork model)
      Sets the model for this PointEstimator.
      default void setParallelMode(boolean parallelMode_)
      Sets the parallel mode for this PointEstimator.
      void setSeed(int seed)
      Sets the seed.

    • Method Detail

      • runInference

        void runInference()
        Runs inference.

      • setModel

        void setModel(BayesianNetwork model)
        Sets the model for this PointEstimator.
        Parameters:
        model - a BayesianNetwork model to which this PointEstimator will be applied.

      • getOriginalModel

        BayesianNetwork getOriginalModel()
        Returns the original model of this PointEstimator.
        Returns:
        a BayesianNetwork object that represents the original model of this InferenceAlgorithm.

      • setEvidence

        void setEvidence(Assignment assignment)
        Sets the evidence for this PointEstimator.
        Parameters:
        assignment - an Assignment object to which the evidence will be set.

      • setParallelMode

        default void setParallelMode(boolean parallelMode_)
        Sets the parallel mode for this PointEstimator. Note that this method is only implemented for the point-estimaros that can be run in parallel.
        Parameters:
        parallelMode_ - a boolean that indicates whether this PointEstimator can be run in parallel (i.e., true) or not (i.e., false).

      • setSeed

        void setSeed(int seed)
        Sets the seed.
        Parameters:
        seed - an int that represents the seed value to be set.

      • getEstimate

        Assignment getEstimate()
        Returns the log probability of the computed estimate.
        Returns:
        an Assignment with the computed estimate.

      • getLogProbabilityOfEstimate

        double getLogProbabilityOfEstimate()
        Returns the log probability of the computed estimate.
        Returns:
        the log probability of the computed estimate.
